TABLE.NAME: comp
TABLE.COMMENT: Totara competencies

TABLE.NAME: comp_evidence
TABLE.COMMENT: Track current proficiency of a user in each competency

TABLE.NAME: comp_evidence_items
TABLE.COMMENT: A competency can be achieved by one or more forms of evidence

TABLE.NAME: comp_evidence_items_evidence
TABLE.COMMENT: Tracks historical progress towards a competency for each user

TABLE.NAME: comp_framework
TABLE.COMMENT: A collection of competencies that use a common competency scale

TABLE.NAME: comp_relations
TABLE.COMMENT: Tracks relationships between competencies

TABLE.NAME: comp_scale
TABLE.COMMENT: Competency scale represents the different levels of achievement of a competency

TABLE.NAME: comp_scale_assignments
TABLE.COMMENT: Tracks which scales are assigned to which competency frameworks

TABLE.NAME: comp_scale_values
TABLE.COMMENT: The individual values that make up a competency scale

TABLE.NAME: comp_template
TABLE.COMMENT: A template is used to group competencies

TABLE.NAME: comp_template_assignment
TABLE.COMMENT: Track competencies belonging to a template

TABLE.NAME: comp_type
TABLE.COMMENT: Competency types are used to manage custom fields

TABLE.NAME: comp_type_info_data
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores custom field data related to competencies

TABLE.NAME: comp_type_info_field
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the custom fields for each competency type

TABLE.NAME: pos
TABLE.COMMENT: Totara positions

TABLE.NAME: pos_assignment
TABLE.COMMENT: Tracks a users current position assignments

TABLE.NAME: pos_assignment_history
TABLE.COMMENT: Tracks a users historical position assignments

TABLE.NAME: pos_competencies
TABLE.COMMENT: Tracks competencies assigned to a particular position

TABLE.NAME: pos_framework
TABLE.COMMENT: A collection of positions

TABLE.NAME: pos_relations
TABLE.COMMENT: Tracks relationships between positions

TABLE.NAME: pos_type
TABLE.COMMENT: Position types are used to manage custom fields

TABLE.NAME: pos_type_info_data
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores custom field data related to positions

TABLE.NAME: pos_type_info_field
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the custom fields for each position type

TABLE.NAME: org
TABLE.COMMENT: Totara organisations

TABLE.NAME: org_competencies
TABLE.COMMENT: Track competencies assigned to a particular organisation

TABLE.NAME: org_framework
TABLE.COMMENT: A collection of organisations

TABLE.NAME: org_relations
TABLE.COMMENT: Tracks relationships between organisations

TABLE.NAME: org_type
TABLE.COMMENT: Organisation types are used to manage custom fields

TABLE.NAME: org_type_info_data
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores custom field data related to organisations

TABLE.NAME: org_type_info_field
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the custom fields for each organisation type
